main.*: Subscribe to the mediawiki-api-announce mailing list at <https://lists.wikimedia.org/postorius/lists/mediawiki-api-announce.lists.wikimedia.org/> for notice of API deprecations and breaking changes.

revisions.*: Because "rvslots" was not specified, a legacy format has been used for the output. This format is deprecated, and in the future the new format will always be used.

__NOTOC__ ==Welcome to the UO Forever Wiki!== ====Quickstart==== [[File:DownloadandPlay.png|left|100px|link=http://www.uoforever.com/download.php]]Click that download & play button! Follow the installation instructions [[Download_%26_Installation|here]]. Create an account by entering your desired username and a password. There is no registration process. Your account is now created! If you have forgotten your password, the new area to automatically '''reset your password is https://portal.uoforever.com/forgotpassword.php If you receive the message "Your account credentials are invalid. Check your user ID and password and try again." Someone may already have used that account name - choose another! You are allowed ''three'' accounts per IP. Using more than three accounts may result in termination of one or all of your accounts. {| width="100%" class="hiddentable" | valign="top" width="22%" colspan="2" style="border: 1px solid #333333; padding: .5em 1em;
